channel.title: Tuesday Night Hootenanny Cottage Cheese and Farm Report
channel.description: 3 guys sitting in a kitchen. Drinking, talking and laughing about almost anything.......actually pretty much anything.
channel.itunes:subtitle: So good it makes you want to smack yo Momma.
channel.itunes:author: Tuesday Night Hootenanny Cottage Cheese and Farm Report
channel.itunes:summary: 3 guys sitting in a kitchen. Drinking, talking and laughing about almost anything.......actually pretty much anything.

item.title: Episode 32: We're Sorry Jeormy's Grandma./What up Poppa Ted!!!
item.description: This week we have our fan Allie Jones from San Francisco http://itunes.apple.com/us/podcast//id492724005?i=109116648 and Nick's wife join us for our Top 5 Fictional Kick Ass Chicks You Would Do. Chaos and hilarity can only describe this episode. Please enjoy and send feedback.
item.dc:creator: Tuesday Night Hootenanny Cottage Cheese and Farm Report

item.title: Episode 31: Green Peppers and Tommy Lee
item.description: It's a host only episode. Jeromy F's with a guy at the grocery store @ tells us about frog giggin. We get an email from Goin Places about the Dan Vapid episode. We discuss the death of MCA and somehow mention Methods of Mayhem. We discuss forming a band. Sam serenades Nick Chris Issac style. Sam mentions the Super Moon. Then Sam gives an unplugged show. Enjoy
item.dc:creator: Tuesday Night Hootenanny Cottage Cheese and Farm Report

item.title: Episode 30: Brandon Reilly
item.description: This week our host have on Mr. Brandon Reilly. Brandon is the lead singer and guitarist of Nightmare Of You. http://nightmareofyou.com/ We had a chat about him being a new dad, his history, the bands history, being musically minimalist, and how the band is releasing new songs. We play Out Of My Mind and we also play We Will Play The Victim. Go to their website and buy their music. After the interview we discuss that Goin Places sent us a care package with t-shirts, buttons, stickers, and their first CD Girl Song Writing 101. http://goinplaces.bandcamp.com/ and finally in another plug the great people over at Merman Records http://mermanrecords.com/ sent us a copy of the Dan Vapid and the Cheats split with The Jetty Boys. Once all the plugging was done we talked about Indiana Jones movies, Sam did a synopsis of The Social Network that was spot on even though he didn't see the movie. Jeromy visited his grandma for mothers day but not his mother. The term "poverty chips" made an appearance and Jeromy and Sam share a wine glass of whiskey. Enjoy. http://tuesdaynighthoot.com, Twitter: @TuesdayNightPod, Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/tuesdaynighthootenanny,

item.title: Episode 29: Zac Damon
item.description: Our interview series continues with singer, songwriter, guitarist Zac Damon (Zoinks!, Big In Japan, Screeching Weasel, Squirtgun, Crushstory, & a brief stint w/ Common Rider featuring Jesse Michaels of Operation Ivy) We talk about his current band Miracle Drugs https://www.facebook.com/miracledrugs/app_2405167945 and their 7 inch you can get at Rally Records website http://rallyrecords.com/releases/miracle-drugs/ After the interview we learned Jeromy's hip hop name, continued talk about Jeromy's Batman tattoo. We play Christian Bale's rant for the first time for Sam to which leads us into American Psycho talk. We also play the Poop Song and the show falls apart at the last 60 seconds. CONTEST!!!!! Jeromy bought 2 copies of the Miracle Drugs 7 inch. One for himself and one for possibly YOU!!! Here's how it works 1: Go to https://www.facebook.com/tuesdaynighthootenanny and LIKE our Facebook Page (if you already do you are 1 step ahead from everyone else) 2: Comment on the post from our FB page (not what everyone else has shared)that has this episode. Episode 29: Zac Damon. It doesn't have to be a long comment but just comment. The 10th person to comment wins the Grimace Purple 7 inch. Good Luck.

item.title: Episode 28: Kim Warnick
item.description: This week our kick ass interview series continues with the legendary Kim Warnick. Kim was part of the very influential band The Fastbacks http://www.allmusic.com/artist/fastbacks-p4234 She was also a member of the band Visqueen and currently in the group Cali Girafes. http://caligiraffes.fourfour.com Check all these groups out and get the music. We also talked about The Avengers and other heroes. Gave Jason Perry crap cause he doesn't watch TV and other shenanigans. Enjoy

item.title: Episode 27: Dan Vapid
item.description: This week in our series of kick ass interviews we talk to the legendary Dan Vapid. Dan has been in so many bands such as Screeching Weasel, The Riverdales, Sludgeworth, The Methadones, Noise By Numbers, and now his NEW band Dan Vapid & The Cheats. www.danvapidandthecheats.com GO GET THE NEW ALBUM!!! You will thank us later. We play a crappy game with Dan and talk about bad shows in central IL. After the interview Jason Perry of the Seething Coast www.facebook.com/pages/The-Seething-Coast/160878693279 who joined us talks about doing a split with Sam where they cover each others songs. Nick can not pronounce Thom and Geoff. Finally Nick is a pussy and doesnt want to deal with conflict.

item.title: Episode 26: JOE QUEER
item.description: I do not need to describe this episode but if you must know, this week we got to chat with the one and only Joe Queer of The Queers. Enjoy.

item.title: Episode 25: Raw Doggin It
item.description: This week our hosts talk about the up coming Green Day albums, If you were at a Moterhead concert and had some sex, congrats you are a father. Kirk Cameron's fellow child stars think he's a dick. We go over our TOP 5 MAN CRUSHES and read some listener mail. Tuesdaynighthoot.com Twitter: @TuesdayNightPod, E-mail tuesdaynighthoot@gmail.com

item.title: Episode 24: Goin' Places
item.description: This week brings us an awesome band from New York, Goin' Places http://goinplaces.bandcamp.com/ We got to chat them up the whole show played them some of their music which you should go buy. They also brought the funny and brought some of their New York celebrity friends. Nick saw The Hunger Games and was razzed about it. We talked about flying cars and Star Wars.

item.title: Episode 23: Hey, You Billy Squire!!!
item.description: This week we had another weigh in and Nick is pathetic, there was a ne Whiskey of the Week and Nick is a pussy. Sam had an awesome work week. We discuss the upcoming Ninja Turtles movie. There is a new phrase that Jeromy's kid learned. Sam and Jeromy attempt some feats of strength (video will be posted @ tuesdaynighthoot.com). Finally we go over our jams of the week. Tuesdaynighthoot@gmail.com, www.tuesdaynighthot.com, @TuesdayNightPod

item.title: Episode 22: Whiskey of the Week
item.description: This week brings us some feedback. Thank you Allie and Megan. We played a song done by listener Allie when she was 15. There are some sound issues going on and I apologize for that. Donate on our podomatic site so we can get some new stuff. http://tuesdaynighthootcheesefarm.podomatic.com/ We had a new segment called Whiskey of the Week where we take a shot of whiskey we never had before. Nick saw Henry Rollins over the weekend, we discussed the Ben Weasel VS. Fat Mike feud. After the break Nick is lit and apparently is funny. Nick shares his embarrassing moment with a homeless man. We want ideas for our next top 5 and you can be involved tuesdaynighthoot@gmail.com or Twitter: @TuesdayNightPod have the best idea and we will have you on the to discuss your 5. Sam and Jeromy share their late night stories. Finally Jeromy wants a tattoo you can vote where he should get it on our facebook page. http://www.facebook.com/tuesdaynighthootenanny Thanks and see you next week.

Thanks and see you next week.

item.title: Episode 21: Diabetus Bruce
item.description: This week we get our first update on the weight loss challenge. We talked about the show we saw on St. Patrick's day with Keven Seconds www.kevinseconds.com and Kepi Ghoulie www.kepighoulie.com We had a little boner moment with each other. Sam's dad knows what 2 girls 1 cup is. We then had Nick's lovely wife Shannon talk about their neighbor and how much of a douche he is. We give a shout out to Cleveland OH. And had a mini segment of our song of the week. See you next week. Don't forget to go to www.tuesdaynighthoot.com and send us an E-Mail to tuesdaynighthoot@gmail.com

item.title: Episode 20: War of the Fat
item.description: This week we had a new intro that featured the racist and rapey comment and also some clips from Clerks 2. We talked about the clips and if we should have played the questionable ones. Sam went to Memphis over the weekend and gave us the back story on that. Jeromy's wife cusses like a sailor but won't do it in front of other people. Jeromy challenged Nick to a weight loss contest for the next 10 weeks don't know what the stakes are yet but check www.tuesdaynighthoot.com for more info. We finished the show with our top 5 scariest movie moments. Talk to you next week.

item.title: Episode 19: Forehead Suvari
item.description: This weeks episode brings us an unfunny but gross moment about Jeromy’s ear. Chatted about China’s new softer billboards about having children. Jeromy tried to get us a plug on the show Pop Sickles http://popsickles.podbean.com/ We played the clip and they assume we might be racist and rapey and joked about it. Called out Patrick Stump from Fall Out Boy for being a P@$$y cause no one likes him anymore and is not fat. Laughed at a guy who was arrested and channeled Hulk Hogan as he was taken to jail. Congrats to Jenn Duke for winning the poster. See you for our big 20th episode.

item.title: Episode 18: You Rang?
item.description: This week our hosts discuss if Johnny Cash is overrated, Nick talks about his stolen debit card information and does his best Liam Neeson impression to the thieves. More Walking Dead talk and we get into movie talk which ends up taking a detour discussing hip hop artist Ludacris and his fried chicken business and Flava Flav’s failed fried chicken business. Jeromy brings up the movie Religulous and we all get into a discussion about believing in God…….Discuss and comment.
